publicclassTopicDispatcherMonitor<C,R> extendsTopicDispatcherDefault<C,R> {
    @OverrideprotectedvoiddoDispatch(Payload<C, R> payload, List<TopicListenerHolder<C, R>> targets)throws Throwable {

            listener.onEvent(payload);

            System.out.println("ç™¼é€å¾Œç›£è¦–...");

        //çµé€Ÿç›£è¦–...

}
